headline.main: IBM, Maersk in Blockchain Tie-Up for Shipping Industry
headline.print_headline: IBM, Maersk in Blockchain Tie-Up for Shipping Industry

lead_paragraph: IBM and Danish transport company Maersk said they were working together to digitize, manage, and track shipping transactions using blockchain technology.
snippet: IBM and Danish transport company Maersk said they were working together to digitize, manage, and track shipping transactions using blockchain technology....
